conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text: Be careful, my brave one, the glen is deep and dark. Full of traps and terrors await. Many went there for adventure, but never came back. Tread gently and slowly.

conversation.speaker: Player
conversation.text: I understand. I promise to bring the forest back.

conversation.speaker: Forest
conversation.text:
The music that once danced on the wind is now silent, leaving the creatures in despair. To restore the sounds, seek the Harmonic Horn hidden within the Whispering Glen. It holds the essence of every melody ever played in this realm.

Let the magic within you guide the way, for the creatures yearn to hear the sweet melodies once more. With the Harmonic Horn, you shall be the conductor of nature's orchestra.

conversation.speaker: Player
conversation.text: I won't let the darkness suffocate this forest any longer. The melodies will flow again, and harmony shall be restored.
